query.statement:
SELECT ZMSTR02.POSID AS CESDPPJT ,RIGHT(ZMSTR02.POSID_1, 3) AS CESDPHNO ,CESDPNXT ,CESDPSNM ,CESDPBJD ,CESDPHDM ,CESDPUPD ,CESDPNAP ,CESDPGAP ,CESDPPIT ,CESDPVRT ,CESDPREQ
,ZMSTR01.ZSITE_NM AS ZSITE_NM ,ZMSTR01.ADDR1||ZMSTR01.ADDR2||'('||ZMSTR01.ZSITE_TEL||')' AS ADDR ,ZPST11.NAMET AS NAMET ,ZMMT12.NAME1 AS NAME1 ,ZSPEC1 ,ZSPEC7 ,ZSPEC11
FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS ZMSTR02 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS ZMSTR01 ON ZMSTR02.MANDT=ZMSTR01.MANDT AND ZMSTR02.POSID=ZMSTR01.POSID INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0011 AS ZPST11 ON ZMSTR02.MANDT=ZPST11.MANDT AND ZMSTR02.TEMNO=ZPST11.TEMNO AND ZPST11.RETIF = '' INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS ZMMT12 ON ZMSTR02.MANDT=ZMMT12.MANDT AND ZMSTR02.LIFNR=ZMMT12.LIFNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZTBESDP AS SDP ON SDP.MANDT=ZMSTR02.MANDT AND ZMSTR02.POSID=SDP.CESDPPJT AND SDP.CESDPHNO=#HNO# WHERE ZMSTR02.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND ZMSTR02.POSID = #PJT# AND RIGHT(ZMSTR02.POSID_1, 3) = #HNO#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
